Name: autosomal recessive cerebellar ataxia
Definition: A hereditary ataxia that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance.

Name: spastic ataxia
Definition: A hereditary ataxia that is characterized by early onset of cerebellar ataxia

Name: X-linked hereditary ataxia
Definition: A hereditary ataxia that is characterized by X-linked inheritance.

Name: autosomal dominant sensory ataxia 1
Definition: A hereditary ataxia characterized by gait difficulty and instability especially in dark conditions resulting from sensory loss in the extremities and without cerebellar involvement that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutations in the RNF170 gene on chromosome 8.

Name: autosomal dominant cerebellar ataxia
Definition: A hereditary ataxia that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance.

Name: episodic ataxia
Definition: A hereditary ataxia characterized by sporadic bouts of ataxia with or without continuous muscle movement.

Name: obsolete genetic anomaly of leucocyte
Definition: A hereditary ataxia characterized by sporadic bouts of ataxia with or without continuous muscle movement.
